page.title: 17HOUSING IN WASHINGTON
page.content: In{Donwell Village}we found that half the 70 people interviewed owned their houses, most had 3 bedrooms. Nearly everyone liked their houses and thought that the range was wide enough. The majority interviewed had previously lived in terraced property. Most houses in{Sulgrave}belong to the{Development Corporation,}579 in all. Many of the 104{private houses have been built in the last 5 years. But Sulgrave is now an undesirable place to live mainly because of {vandalism}near the flats. In{Usworth,}houses have been built by the{Council}and{private}firms. A few people, working in{co-operatives, have built their own. Bungalows, link villas and stone built cottages are some styles available. Most have gardens and many have garages or car
